title: maravAdiru manamE orupOdum
sahitya:
maravAdiru manamE orupOdum inimEl marudamalai mIdil magizhum muruganai nI


anupallavi

  siridum varundAdu shramam Edum illAdu paramAnandam uravE pArinil sirappuravE


caraNam    tAmarai ilai mEl taNNIrt-tuLi pOl kAma pAsha valaiyil kaTTup-paTTiDamal
kSEmamAga ulagil jIvittu magizhavE mAmayil mAl amar mAl marugOnai nI
